# ::snt kuna puga iliniacha kwa sababu nilipiga mvinyo nikamsho ukweli...usinipee i drown my sorrows
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / person
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Kuna"

            :ARG2 p
            :name n
            :op1 "usinipee"))
